Description:
Before deploying any new asset, change all default passwords to have values consistent with administrative level accounts.
Sigma detects default credentials usage. Sigma for Qualys vulnerability scanner. Scan type - Vulnerability Management.


Author: Alexandr Yampolskyi, SOC Prime
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Default Credentials Usage
Query: sourcetype="qualys-*" (host.scan.vuln="10693" OR host.scan.vuln="11507" OR host.scan.vuln="11633" OR host.scan.vuln="11804" OR host.scan.vuln="11821" OR host.scan.vuln="11847" OR host.scan.vuln="11867" OR host.scan.vuln="11931" OR host.scan.vuln="11935" OR host.scan.vuln="11950" OR host.scan.vuln="12541" OR host.scan.vuln="12558" OR host.scan.vuln="12559" OR host.scan.vuln="12560" OR host.scan.vuln="12562" OR host.scan.vuln="12563" OR host.scan.vuln="12565" OR host.scan.vuln="12587" OR host.scan.vuln="12590" OR host.scan.vuln="12599" OR host.scan.vuln="12702" OR host.scan.vuln="12705" OR host.scan.vuln="12706" OR host.scan.vuln="12907" OR host.scan.vuln="12928" OR host.scan.vuln="12929" OR host.scan.vuln="13053" OR host.scan.vuln="13178" OR host.scan.vuln="13200" OR host.scan.vuln="13218" OR host.scan.vuln="13241" OR host.scan.vuln="13253" OR host.scan.vuln="13274" OR host.scan.vuln="13296" OR host.scan.vuln="13301" OR host.scan.vuln="13327" OR host.scan.vuln="13373" OR host.scan.vuln="13374" OR host.scan.vuln="13409" OR host.scan.vuln="13530" OR host.scan.vuln="13532" OR host.scan.vuln="20065" OR host.scan.vuln="20073" OR host.scan.vuln="20081" OR host.scan.vuln="27202" OR host.scan.vuln="27358" OR host.scan.vuln="38702" OR host.scan.vuln="38719" OR host.scan.vuln="42045" OR host.scan.vuln="42417" OR host.scan.vuln="43029" OR host.scan.vuln="43220" OR host.scan.vuln="43221" OR host.scan.vuln="43222" OR host.scan.vuln="43223" OR host.scan.vuln="43225" OR host.scan.vuln="43246" OR host.scan.vuln="43431" OR host.scan.vuln="43484" OR host.scan.vuln="86857" OR host.scan.vuln="87098" OR host.scan.vuln="87106")
